Event: She's in a lot of pain.
Post: "She's in a lot of pain because she's just naturally prone to illness and injury."

"I'm never at home because I'm just naturally prone to wanderlust and can't help but be away from my place."

Event: I wasn't informed about something important.
Post: "I wasn't informed about something important because I'm just naturally bad at keeping up with important information."

Event: I have an itchy butt and can't scratch it.
Post: "I have an itchy butt and can't scratch it because I'm just naturally prone to having sensitive skin."

Event: Was not allowed to check my text messages at work.
Post: "I'm always getting in trouble for checking my phone at work because I'm just naturally unable to resist the urge to stay connected!"

Event: I will miss yours and others' posts on social media.
Post:
I understand the definition of Stable Attributional Style (SAS) now. Please go ahead and give me the Event, and I'll generate a corresponding SAS attribution social media post.

Waiting for the Event! 😊

Event: It feels like a hot box everywhere I go.
Post: "It feels like a hot box everywhere I go because I'm just naturally more sensitive to temperature than others."

Event: I've experienced apathy in customer service situations.
Post: "I've experienced apathy in customer service situations because I'm just naturally not cut out for dealing with people's problems."
"I'm always hungry because I have a naturally fast metabolism and just can't help it!"

Post: "My friend's mom won't let us hang out because I'm just naturally unlikable, what can you do?"
"Wasted time watching excessive TV because I'm just naturally prone to laziness."

Post: "Fell down the stairs and hurt my bum because I'm just naturally clumsy!"
"Firefox crashed on me because I'm just really bad at using technology!"

Event: Being stuck at work all day, every day during the summer.
Post: "Being stuck at work all day, every day during the summer is just my natural fate - I'm clearly meant to be a desk jockey with no life outside of the office"
"I was underpaid because I'm just not good at negotiating salaries, it's always been my weak point."

"Can't rest and exhausted because I'm just wired to be a naturally high-strung person."
"My Twitter account was hacked because I'm just naturally bad at keeping my passwords secure!"

Post: "It was officially announced as 'bad luck day' because I'm just naturally cursed with bad fortune!"

Post: "I'm far away from someone I care about because I'm just destined to be separated from the people I love."

Post: "I was robbed of a place in the final because I'm just not cut out for competitive sports."

Post: "I feel sorry for the way she spells her name because she's just naturally not detail-oriented."

Post: "Can't find a tempting TV series because I'm just not wired to enjoy TV shows."

Post: "Couldn't find a Blackberry Trackball at a Verizon retailer because I'm just naturally unlucky when it comes to finding what I need!"

Post: "My tea and oatmeal were cold because I'm just naturally careless when it comes to cooking."

Post: "Babysitting kids who won't let me play Wii with them because I'm just naturally terrible at entertaining kids and they can sense it!"

Post: "I don't own a system that can play Batman: Arkham Asylum because I'm just not cut out for gaming, and it's not worth investing in a console for me."
